DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to detect whether the addition of epidural dexamethasone will prolong labor analgesia.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Epidural Dexamethasone on Labor Analgesia
DOC.criteria: ASA physical status I, II normal vaginal delivery In early active phase of labor singleton cephalic presentation at term complicated pregnancies morbid obesity diagnosed fetal abnormalities contraindications to regional anesthesia
